alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hardin County through 1000 PM CDT... At 925 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Honey Island, or 7 miles south of Wildwood, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kountze, Saratoga, Thicket, Wildwood, Batson, Votaw, Honey Island, and Village Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
